FinEq.jl
============================================
Financial Equations in Julia

###Section 1. Deterministic Cash Flows

*Easy enough to compute these. Serves as an exercise in programming with Julia

1. EIR() Effective Interest Rate
2. NPV() Net Present Value
3. APR() Annual Percentage Rate

### Section 2. Investment Appraisal Measures

1. Sharpe Ratio *CAPM*
2. Treynor Ratio *CAPM*
3. Jensen Measure *CAPM*
4. Sortino Index
5. Sterling Ration and Calmar Ratio
6. CDaR
